name: @tenoxui/property
description: Default types and properties for TenoxUI CSS framework.
author: NOuSantx <nousantx@gmail.com>

scripts.build:umd: terser -o dist/umd/default.min.js src/umd/default.js -m && terser -o dist/umd/full.min.js src/umd/full.js -m && cp src/umd/* dist/umd/
scripts.build:esm: terser -o dist/esm/default.min.js src/esm/default.js -m && terser -o dist/esm/full.min.js src/esm/full.js -m && cp src/esm/* dist/esm/
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist dist/umd dist/esm && npm run build:umd && npm run build:esm
